attributes.action: Ensure governing bodies discipline  Headteachers who exploit their staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
School support staff are being exploited by some unscrupulous headteachers who are forcing them to change their working practices even though they may be unwilling to do so.
 This style of management  is unacceptable and certainly not construsive to a happy and successful working environment.
Some governing bodies are unwilling to take appropriate action under these circumstances and the government must issue new guidance to schools ensuring that governors rigorously monitor the professional conduct of headteachers in our schools.
